body_html: Yes - let's close this and leave the seq2seq attention model as is (many people are using it successfully). We might implement another attention model with more features at some point, but that's a different issue.

body: Yes - let's close this and leave the seq2seq attention model as is (many people are using it successfully). We might implement another attention model with more features at some point, but that's a different issue.
